statements: DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND contract_start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM contracts WHERE contract_value < 10000);
DELETE FROM Contract WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Product WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND quantity <= 0;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Supplier%' AND address IS NOT NULL;
